entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY, Kinngait
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 p.m. EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kinngait (Cape Dorset Airport) 2:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle mixed with light snow changing to drizzle this afternoon. Fog at times. Wind east 20 km/h. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
